titleStmt.title: That's How Love Starts, Ya Know!

cbml:balloon.p: LIKE I SAID, IF YA AIN'T GONNA LEND ME THE MONEY...
...THEN TODAY'S DATE IS OFF.
HAH?
ALTHOUGH...
...IF YOU'RE REASONABLE AND PUT OUT INSTEAD, THAT'S COOL TOO.
LOVE HOTEL'S ON YOU THOUGH.
WHOA!
TAKE THIS!
YOU LITTLE-!
URF!
GET OVER YERSELF!
I'M DONE MESSIN' WITH YOU!
YER BROKE, AND YOU WON'T PUT OUT! LIKE I'D GIVE A SHIT ABOUT YOU!
THAT'S NOT EVEN FUNNY! MORON! FISH BRAIN!
SQUID! OCTOPUS!
THAT'S HILAR, GURL!
CALLING HIM SEAFOOD ISN'T BADMOUTHING HIM!
YOU'RE SUPPOSED TO BE COMFORTING MEEE!
HE WAS MY FIRST BOYFRIEND!
I TOLD YOU NOТ TO GET INVOLVED WITH THAT GUY
CAN YOU EVEN NAME ONE GOOD THING ABOUT HIM?
HE LOOKED LIKE KEN TAKAKURA.
UGH, HERE WE GO AGAIN.
UGH, HERE WE GO AGAIN.
GOD, YOU MAKE ME SICK.
GOD, YOU MAKE ME SICK.
WHAT'S WRONG WITH THAT?! I LIKE HARD-BOILED TOUGH GUYS LIKE KEN TAKAKURA!
I AM AN AWKWARD FELLOW, AFTER ALL.
DUDES LIKE THAT ARE EXTINCT.
DUDES LIKE THAT ARE EXTINCT.
IT'S A DAMN SHAME.
WILL I NEVER MEET ANOTHER KEN?
I MEAN, COME ON... SOMEBODY, ANYBODY, CONSOLE ME!
IT'S A HARDKNOCK LIFE...
QUIT LOOKING AT ME. YOU'RE CREEPING ME OUT.
TRY ONE WITH A MAGNEТ IN IT.
DAMN, THIS ONE'S GONNA HURT!
WHAT'RE YOU READING THERE
HUH? UMM, WELL, IT'S...
UGH, LAME!
IS THE WORLD JUST FULL OF SCUMBAGS?
GAH! I HATE THIS!
WHAT CAN I DO TO UNLEASH THIS STRESS?!
MISS MOMO AYASE!
I KNOW WHAT YOU'RE INTO.
HAH?
I KNOW WHAT YOU'RE INTO.
HOW MANY TIMES ARE YOU GONNA REPEAT YOURSELF?
FOR A PERSON LIKE YOU, MISS AYASE, TO COME TALK TO A FELLOw LIKE ME?
THERE CAN BE ONLY ONE EXPLANATION!
I THINK YOU'VE GOT THЕ WRONG IDEA.
I'M NOТ TRYIN' TO BE YOUR FRIEND..
JUST FORGET WHAT HAPPENED BACK THERE.
THIS IS WHAT I'M TALKING ABOUT!
PRESIDENT ОВАМА HAS ALREADY BEEN TO MARS!
THE WHOLE OF PROJECТ PEGASUS REVEALED!

stage.cbml:caption: RIGHTS NEGOTIATIONS FOR REPTILIANS MARS, AND THE EARTH!
WHAT IS THE RELATIONSHIP BETWEEN THE ILLUMINATI ANDTHE REPTILIANS?!

cbml:balloon.p: HUH? SAY WHAT?
YOU'RE INTERESTED IN THE PARANORMAL, AREN'T YOU?!
NAH.
I DON'T BELIEVE IN UFOS OR ALIENS.
I'M TALKING ABOUT UAPS, NOT UFOS!
UNIDENTIFIED AERIAL PHENOMENA!
THE AMERICAN MILITARY HAS OFFICIALLY ACKNOWLEDGED THE EXISTENCE OF UAPS AND HAS BEEN REORGANIZED AS THE SPACE FORCE!

stage.cbml:caption: KOKU-JIEITAI *SPACE OPERATIONS SQUADRONS*

cbml:balloon.p: WHILE JAPAN HAS FOUNDED THE JAPAN AIR AND SPAСE SELF-DEFENSE FORCE!
ANY WAY YOU LOOK AT IT, THEY'RE PREPARING FOR A SPACE WAR!
CAN I GO NOW?
HUH?! NO! WAIT...
THEY'VE GOT THЕ LATEST PICTURES OF NESSIE IN HERE!
AND STUFF ABOUT LIEUTENANT COLONEL JIM CHANNON!
AND SKINWALKER RANCH!
WOULD YOU SHUT THE HELL UP! I'M DEALING WITH A BROKEN HEART HERE!
I'M NOT IN THE MOOD FOR THIS NONSENSE! YOU'RE REALLY PUSHIN' IT WITH THAT NERD CRAP!
THIS IS WHY YOU DON'T HAVE ANY FRIENDS!
DON'T TALK TO ME LIKE WE'RE FRIENDS.
SORRY.
I WENT TOO FAR/.
LOOK.
I DON'T BELIEVE IN ALIENS...
...BUT I DO BELIEVE IN SPIRITS.
NO WAY. THERE'S NO SUCH THING AS SPIRITS.
HAH?!
I WENT ALONG WITH YOUR NONSENSE, AND YOU HAVE THE NERVE TO JUST SHUT ME DOWN?!
PLEASE DO NOT BELITTLE THE PARANORMAL!
LEMME TELL YA SOMETHIN'. MY GRANDMA'S A SPIRIT MEDIUM!
A WHAT?!
HAVE YOU EVER SEEN AN EXORCISM?! IT'S SOО0 SCARY!
THE POSSESSED PERSON HAS FITS AND STUFF!
ILLNESSES CAN ALSO CAUSE FITS.
THAT'S NO PROOF THAT SPIRITS EXIST.
OH, YEAН? WELL, HAVE YOU EVER HAD AN ALIEN OFFER YOU A RIDE IN ITS UFO?!
YOUR ARGUMENTS ARE ALL OVER THE PLACE!
DON'T BE AN IDIOT!
WHAT THE...?
SEEMS SHE'S GIVEN UP ON KEN TAKAKURA FOR THE GEEK TУРЕ.
I DON'T THINK SHE CARES HOW SHE LOOKS EITHER.
CAN'T SAY I HATE IT.
ALL RIGHT, TWERP. LET'S MAKE IT A CHALLENGE, THEN!
IF I CAN PROVE SPIRITS ARE REAL...
...THEN YOU HAVE TO SERVE AS MY GOFER!
FINE. THEN I'LL SHOW YOU SOME UFOS!
I MEAN, UAPS!
AND WHEN YOU FINALLY SEE ONE...
UM! THEN YOU'LL SERVE AS MY GOFER, MISS AYASE!
WHAT IS THIS PLACE?! IT'S SCARING THE CRAP OUTTA ME!
AND YOU'RE TELLING ME THIS IS A UFO HOTSPOТ?!
THEY SAY THE NAGI HOSPITAL IS PRACTICALLY THE HOLY LAND FOR UFOS!
IF YOU CALL FOR A UFO FROM THE ROOF...
...YOU'LL DEFINITELY BE ABDUCTED!
WHAT DOES THAT EVEN MEEEAN?!
IT MEANS YOU GET KIDNAPPED BY ALIENS AND THEY USE YOU FOR HUMAN EXPERIMENTATION!
WHOA! HOLD ON! HAVE YOU BEEN EXPERIMENTED ON?!
IT'S VERY POSSIBLE!
HUH?
MOST OF THE PEOPLE WHO ARE ABDUCTED HAVE THEIR MEMORIES WIPED.
LISTEN, YOU.
YOU'VE NEVER ACTUALLY SEEN A UFO, HAVE YOU?
HAVE YOU HEARD OF REGRESSIVE HYPNOSIS?
QUIT DODGING THE QUESTION!
WHETHER I'VE SEEN ONE OR NOT IS INCONSEQUENTIAL!
THE QUESTION IS WHETHER OR NOT THE ARGUMENT IS SOLID!
JUST SHUT UP ALREADY.
HOW ARE THINGS GOING ON YOUR END?
I HAVE ARRIVED...
...AT THE HAUNTED LOCATION.
NOW, THEN!
SHALL I PROVE TO YOU ONCE AND FOR ALL...
...THAT THERE IS NO SUCH THING AS GHOSTS!
HEY, YOU AREN'T ACTUALLY SCARED, ARE YOU?
BY THE WAY, THEY SAY YOU ARE GUARANTEED TO SEE SOMETHING THERE. IT'S FAMOUS ON THE NET.
YIKES!
TOO SHY SHY BOY!
IN THIS MOMENT!
THEY SAY A LOUD VOICE IS THE MOST DANGEROUS THING OF ALL.
ON THE NET.
TOO SHY SHY BOY!
WAIT, WHY DO YOU KEEР SAYING "ON THE NET"?
HAVE YOU SEEN A SPIRIT, MISS AYASE?
NOPE.
WHAT?!
YOU HAD SOME NERVE TALKING SO BIG BEFORE!
SORRY!
TAKE BACK ALL THAT STUFF YOU SAID!
YOU'VE NEVER EVEN SEEN A SPIRIT, BUT YOU STILL BELIEVE IN THEM-THAT'S JUST BIZARRE!
IT'S NOT BIZARRE!
I TOLD YOU, MY GRANDMA'S A SPIRIT MEDIUM.
AND WE WERE, LIKE, REAL CLOSE...
...CUZ I'VE GOT NO PARENTS.
OH...I... I SEE...
NOW YOU'RE ALL TIMID?
I NEED TO TELL YOU SOMETHING.
MY FAMILY IS, LIKE, SUPER WEIRD.
WHENEVER I USED TO GO OUTSIDE, I'D HAVE TO SWEAR TO DO A CERTAIN RITUAL FOR GOOD LUCK.
MY GRANDMA MADE ME DO IT ALL THE WAY TO SCHOOL TOO.
AND OF COURSE THE BOYS WOULD LAUGH AT ME.
BUT IF I DIDN'T DO IT, MY GRANDMA WOULD GET ANGRY, AND THEN I'D FEEL PRETTY BAD ABOUT IT.
WORST OF ALL, THOUGH...
...WAS WHEN THE BOY I LIKED MADE FUN OF ME.
I REALLY HATED MY GRANDMА FOR THAT.
"BECAUSE OF THAT RITUAL, THE BOY I LIKE HATES ME NOW!" THAT'S WHAT I THOUGHT.
I SAID SOME TERRIBLE THINGS.
AND TO MY OWN GRANDМА.
WE STOPPED TALKING FOR A LONG TIME.
AND I STOPPED DOING THE RITUAL.
BUT THE WEIRD THING IS, WHEN OTHER PEOPLE MAKE FUN OF MY FAMILY...
...IT REALLY PISSES ME OFF.
AND THEN I REALIZED SOMETHING.
IT WASN'T THAT THE BOY I LIKED DIDN'T LIKE ME.
WHAT I REALLY HATED WAS THAT THE BOY I LIKED...
...MADE FUN OF MY GRANDМА.
THE TRUTH IS, MY GRANDMА...
... AND HER WORK AS A MEDIUM...
...FELT SPECIAL TO ME, AND I LOVED THAT.
SO NO, I'VE NEVER SEEN A GHOST.
AND I DON'T KNOW IF MY GRANDMA'S ABILITY TO SENSE THE SUPERNATURAL IS THE REAL THING OR NOT.
BUT SHE TOOK ME INTO HER CARE...
... AND I WAS RAISED BY THE HANDS OF THAT ONE WOMAN.
AND THAT GRANDMА...
... 15 SOMEONE I BELIEVE IN.
THAT'S WHY...
...I BELIEVE IN SPIRITS.
SO, LIKE, WHY DO YOU BELIEVE IN ALIENS?
HUH?
WELL... DOES IT REALLY MATTER?
SERIOUSLY? YOU REALLY DON'T HAVE A REASON?
DO YOU NEED TO HAVE A REASON TO LIKE SOMETHING?!
R-REALLY? I DO?
I GUESS YOU'RE EASY TO TALK TO, MISS AYASE...
I'LL LET YOU SUCKLE MY TEATS...
...F YOU LET ME GOBBLE YOUR SCHLONG.
GHOOOST!
WAIT!
WHATEVER YOU DO, DON'T RUN!
AAAAAAA
NO WAY!
IT CAN'T BE!
IT'S JUST AN OLD LADY!
THAT'S PROBABLY IT!
JUST AN OLD LADY!
OCCU...KUN...
STOP RIGHT NOW
THE NET SAYS THAT'S SUPER DANGEROUS!
HUFF
HUFF
I JUST MISUNDERSTOOD!
MERELY A CHANCE ENCOUNTER WITH A HORNY OLD LADY!
DO NOT LET HER OVERTAKE YOU, NO MATTER WHAT!
IF YOU LOSE THE RACE AGAINST TURBO GRANNY...
...SHE'LL PUT A CURSE ON YOU!
AAH!
HEY!
OCCULT-KUN, CAN YOU HEAR ME?!
HELLO?! ANSWER ME!
THIS CAN'T BE HAPPENING!
I'M ON MY WAY!
I'M ON MY WAY!
WHAT THE HECK ARE YOU?
IF YOU COULD JUST, LIKE, STOP NOW...
WHAT IN THE...?
GYAH!
HELLO TO YOU, WOMAN PERSON.
WE ARE SERPOIANS.
WE ARE CALLED THAT BECAUSE WE COME FROM THE PLANET SERPO.
YOU'RE ALIENS?!
YOUR THINGS ARE BEING HANDLED WITH CARE.
THEY'RE TORN TО PIECES! YOU OWE ME COMPENSATION!
AND I WANNA LEAVE NOW!
COULD YOU LET ME OUTTA THIS THING?!
OUR SPECIES HAS ONLY MALES.
THEREFORE, WE INCREASE OUR NUMBERS THROUGH CLONING TECHNOLOGY.
ARE YOU EVEN LISTENING TO ME?!
HOWEVER, WHEN EVERY INDIVIDUAL IS IDENTICAL, EVOLUTION OF THE SPECIES DOES NOT OCCUR...
AS A RESULT, CONFLICT AND EMOTIONS SUCH AS JOY, ANGER, GRIEF, AND PLEASURE HAVE BEEN ERADICATED.
AND SO, IN ORDER FOR US TO REACQUIRE REPRODUCTIVE FUNCTIONS...
... WE WISH TO HAVE YOUR KIND'S BANANA ORGANS.
SAY WHAT?
WE WILL NOW PERFORM THE SEХ ACT.
AFTER PERFORMING SEX WITH YOU, WE WILL EXTRACТ YOUR WOMB AND BANANA ORGANS FOR OUR RESEARCH.
AS IF! SURE, I WAS DATING A REAL DIRTBAG...
...BUT I STILL MANAGED TO WALK AWAY WITH MY VIRGINITY INTACT!
I'VE MAINTAINED MY CHASTITY FOR THE KEN TAKAKURA I'VE YET TO FIND...
...AND I'LL BE DAMNED IF I LET SOME CREEPY-ASS ALIENS JUST TAKE IT FROM ME!
AH!
AH...
UGH...
IN ORDER TO AROUSE YOUR DESIRE, WE WILL CONTROL YOUR BRAIN WAVES WITH PSYCHOKINESIS.
NOW, HOW IS THAT?
YOUR BODY IS GROWING WARMER AND WARMER, IS IT NOT?
OH, NO! KEN TAKAKURAAA!
YOU'RE RESISTING OUR PSYCHOKINESIS?
WHAT REMARKABLE FORCE OF WILL.
HOWEVER, I SHAL1 BEGIN.
NO!
STOP!
HER PHONE?
A PERSON WITH BAD TIMING, IT WOULD SEEM...
MISS AYASE!
I'M SO SORRY!
THERE WAS A SPIRIT!
AND I WOUND UP...
...GETTING CURSED BY THE TURBO GRANNY!
OCCULT-KUN! THANK GOD! PLEASE SAVE MЕ!
WHO WOULD YOU BE?
USING A SMART PHONE TO INFILTRATE US...
...IS A TECHNOLOGY THAT EVEN WE DO NOT HAVE.
HELP MЕ, PLEASE!
I CAN'T CONTROL MYSE-
LET ME GOBBLE YOUR SCHLONG.
COME ON! GET А HOLD OF YOURSELF!
HUMAN MALE.
YOU DO NOT HAVE PERMISSION TO ENTER THIS PLACE.
LEAVE AT ONCE.
IF YOU DO NOT...
...THEN GIVE US YOUR BANANA ORGAN.
EW!
SIX SENSE ORGANS!
HE IS FAST!
I CANNOТ TRAIN MY PSYCHOKINESIS ON HIM!
OUR PRECIOUS BANANA ORGANS!
YOU BANANA THIEF!
SERPOIAN FORM SERPOGRAMMETRY!
I HAVE YOU!
OCCULT-KUN!
AUGH!
NEVER HAVE WE ENCOUNTERED SUCH A PHYSICALLY AGGRESSIVE PERSON.
WE HAVE ESTABLISHED FRIENDLY RELATIONS WITH HUMANKIND...
...SO PLEASE GIVE US YOUR BANANA ORGANS.
YOU CAN HAVE IT! IF IT'S MY OWN, YOU CAN HAVE WHATEVER YOU WANT!
ALL MY LIFE I'VE WANTED TO MEEТ ALIENS!
I DON'T HAVE ANY FRIENDS...
...SO I THOUGHT IF THERE WERE ALIENS, MAYBE THEY WOULD BE FRIENDS WITH ME!
EVER SINCE ELEMENTARY SCHOOL, I'VE LOOKED TO THE SKIES AND ASKED FOR UFOS TO COME!
BUT THEY NEVER DID!
NO MATTER HOW MUCH I CALLED FOR THEМ, THEY NEVER APPEARED!
HUMANS BULLIED ME JUST FOR KICKS...
AND ALIENS IGNORED ME!
NO ONE WOULD ACKNOWLEDGE MY EXISTENCE!
BUT MISS AYASE...
...ACTUALLY STOOD UP FOR ME!
SO DON'T YOU LAY A HAND ON HER!
IF YOU HURT HER, YOU WON'T GET AWAY WITH IT!
I'D EVEN BECOME...
...A MONSTER, IF IT'S FOR HER SAKE!
YOU CAN DO IT, OCCULT-KUN!
SHOW THEM WHAT A MAN YOU ARE!
FIE!
MISS AYASE!
I DON'T THINK I CAN DO IT AFTER ALL!
AREN'T YOU GIVING UP A BIT TOO QUICKLY?!
A BARBARIC PERSON SUCH AS YOURSELF...
...WILL NOT DO FOR A FRIEND.
WHAT'S MORE, WE PREFER WOMEN PERSONS...
URK!
...ABOVE MALE PERSONS.
NOW, ONCE AGAIN...
...I SHALL AROUSE YOUR DESIRE.
NNGH!
NOW SEND OUT YOUR CHI
I DON'T WANNA!
EVERY DAY...
...MY FRIENDS MAKE FUN OF ME FOR IT.
WHAT ARE YOП TALKING ABOUT?! IF YOU RELEASE YOUR CHI...
...NO ILLNESS OR ACCIDENT WILL TROUBLE YOU!
NOTHING EVIL CAN COME NEAR YOU!
FIRST, FOCUS YOUR ENERGY BELOW YOUR BELLY...
...THEN VISUALIZE YOUR CHI BEAMING OUT OF THE CROWN OF YOUR HEAD.
HA HA! LOOK! SHE'S DOING IT AGAIN!
WHAT A WEIRDO! YOU TRYIN' TO COMMUNICATE WITH ALIENS OR SOMETHIN'?!
I HATE IT! I'M NEVER DOING IT AGAIN!
MOMO! WAIT!
I HATE YOU, GRANDMA!
YOU PHONY SPIRIT MEDIUM!
WHY AM I REMEМBERING THAT AT А TIME LIKE THIS?
I'M SO SORRY GRANDMА.
I WAS JUST EMBARRASSED BACK THEN, THAT'S ALL...
FOCUS YOUR ENERGY BELOW YOUR BELLY...
...THEN VISUALIZE YOUR CHІ...
NO WAY!
WHOA!
MISS AYASE, YOU HAVE PARANORMAL ABILITIES?!
I'M AS SHOCKED AS YOU ARE!
WHAAAT?! MY PSYСНОKINESIS IS BEING PUSHED BACK!
HOW?!
THIS PERSON WAS NOT ABLE TO EMPLOY PSYCHOKINESIS BEFORE!
COULD IT BE?!
DID I OVERSTIMULATE HER BRAINWAVES WITH MY PSYCHOKINESIS...
...CAUSING THE WOMAN PERSON'S CHAKRA TO OPEN UP?!
...CAUSING THE WOMAN PERSON'S CHAKRA TO OPEN UP?!
GRANDMА IS AN HONESTTO-GOODNESS REAL SPIRIT MEDIUM!
THANK YOU, GRANDMА! NOW I CAN SEND THESE SCUMBAGS...
...FLYING INTO NEXT YEAR!!
GYAAAH!
WHAT THE HECK?! WERE WE IN A UFO?!
OCCULT-KUN, ARE YOU OKAY?!
WE GOTTA GET OUTTA HERE!
YOWCH! WHAT THE HELL ARE YOU DOING, YOU MORON?!
GET A HOLD OF YOURSELF DAMN IT!
YOU SON OF A BITCH!
TURBO GRANNY !!
WHO ARE YOU, YOU WORM?
GWAAGH!
THE CURSE STILL ISN'T LIFTED?!
EVEN THOUGH GRANNY HAS LEFT HIS BODY!
I HAVE HIS SCHLONG NOW.
AS LONG AS I HAVE HIS SCHLONG...
...THE CURSE ON THE YOUNGSTER WILL REMAIN.
IF YOU WANT IT BACK, THEN COME TO THE TUNNEL.
THIS PLACE IS TOO FAR AWAY FOR ME.
AT THE TUNNEL, I WILL TAKE ON AS MUCH AS YOU CARE TO GIVE!
YOU GARISH LITTLE BITCH...
WHO'RE YOU CALLING A GARISH BITCH, YOU OLD HAG!
GIVE HIM BACK HIS THINGY!
EEEEK!
OH NO! ANYWAY RIGHT NOW WE GOТТА GET OUTTA HERE OR WE'RE DEAD MEAT!
PULL IT TOGETHER, YOU IDIOT!
WE GOTTA RUN FOR IT!
GYAAAH!
THAT WAS THЕ WORST.
WELP I DEFINITELY BELIEVE IN ALIENS NOW.
I MEAN, I WAS ABDUCTED BY THEM.
AND I BELIEVE IN SPIRITS.
I WAS CURSED BY ONE.
SO WHAT DО WE DO NOW?
GOOD QUESTION.
HUH?! YOU'RE GOING NOW?!
MISS AYASE, PLEASE PUT ON MY CLOTHES AND GO HOME.
HANG ON! WITHOUT ME, YOU'LL GO BERSERK AGAIN!
EVERYTHING THAT'S HAPPENED IS MY FAULT...
I WON'T HAVE YOU BE INVOLVED IN IT ANY FURTHER.
I'LL WORK UP THE COURAGE TO GO TO THE TUNNEL.
AND AFTER THAT, I'LL SOLVE THIS. SOMEHOW.
WHY AREN'T YOU ASKING ME TO COME WITH?!
AFTER WHAT I JUST EXPERIENCED, I CAN'T JUST WALK AWAY!
BESIDES, IF I HADN'T BEEN THERE, YOU'D BE DEAD, YA KNOW!
ISN'T IT BETTER IF WE WORK TOGETHER?!
ARE YOU SURE? I MEAN, EVEN IF YOU HELP ME...
GEEZ, WOULD YOU SHUT UP ABOUT IT?!
COME ON, PUT ON YOUR CLOTHES! WE'RE GOING!
S-SORRY..
SO, PLEASE, MISS AYASE, PUT THESE ON.
IF YOU DON'T, I WON'T BE ABLE TO SPEAK TO YOU PROPERLY.
WHAT THE...?
WHY IS MY HEART RACING?
NO, IT'S NOT.
I WAS JUST TAKEN ABACK WHEN HE HAPPENED TO SAY THAT KEN TAKAKURA LINE, THAT'S ALL.
CALM DOWN, MOMO, WOULD YA...
YA KNOW...
NOW THAT I THINK ABOUT IT, WHAT'S YOUR NAME AGAIN?
I'M REALLY BAD AT REMEMBERING NAMES!
OH, UH...
IT'S KEN TAKAKURA.
